wikipedia_page.main:
Sir Robert John Thomas, 1st Baronet (23 April 1873 – 27 September 1951) was a Welsh businessman and Liberal Party politician, who was twice elected to Parliament.
Thomas was a ship and insurance broker. In 1918 he was created a Baronet, of Garreglwyd in the County of Anglesey.

response: * Sir Robert Thomas, 1st Baronet (1873–1951), former Liberal Member of Parliament in Wales

After the end of her literary career, Parry worked as a secretary for the politician Sir Robert Thomas, 1st Baronet. Efforts by the BBC  to adapt her works have ended in development hell.
